Description:
Detects the addition of the "Debugger" value to the "DbgManagedDebugger" key in order to achieve persistence. Which will get invoked when an application crashes

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Potential Registry Persistence Attempt Via DbgManagedDebugger
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where (target_object like '%\microsoft\.netframework\dbgmanageddebugger' and  not details = '"c:\windows\system32\vsjitdebugger.exe" pid %d appdom %d extext "%s" evthdl %d')
